hero.title: Hi, I'm a Junior Developer
hero.subtitle: Building beautiful, functional web experiences with modern technologies
hero.description: I specialize in Java, C#, and JavaScript. Currently learning the web development stack and passionate about creating clean, user-friendly applications.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a junior developer with 1.5 years of professional experience in Java development. I'm passionate about learning new technologies and building applications that solve real problems.
about.paragraph2: My journey started with Java backend development, expanded to C# projects, and now I'm diving deep into modern web technologies including JavaScript, React, and Next.js.
about.paragraph3: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and continuously improving my skills. I'm eager to collaborate with experienced developers and contribute to meaningful projects.
about.paragraph4: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new frameworks, contributing to open-source, or discussing tech with the dev community.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects I've built and learned from

experience.title: Experience & Journey
experience.subtitle: My professional path and learning experiences

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's connect and build something great together
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
